li.label: Canid muzzle
li.description: I sound ridiculous trying to speak with this thing.

li.label: Canid muzzle
li.description: So many scents! This is incredible!

li.label: Canid muzzle
li.description: I'm smelling things I wish I couldn't. I want my old face back.

li.label: Canid ears
li.description: They're a bit too sensitive, everything's too loud for comfort.

li.label: Canid ears
li.description: My hearing is so clear now, I bet I could hear a pin drop on the other side of the colony!

li.label: Canid ears
li.description: I swear I can hear them talking about me. Why is this happening to me?

li.label: Canid tail
li.description: I hope making a tail-hole in my pants won't be too hard.

li.label: Canid tail
li.description: Whenever I think about it it just starts to wag!

li.label: Canid tail
li.description: I can't even sit on a chair without this damn thing getting in the way!
